member.name: T:VisCommonEditor
member.summary: This is the common base custom editor for visualizer studio objects and classes.

member.name: F:VisCommonEditor.showAutomaticInspectorGUI
member.summary: This indicates if the automatic inspector gui should be shown.

member.name: M:VisCommonEditor.DisplayIVisManagerTargetGUI(IVisManagerTarget)
member.summary: This displays the drop down for selecting a manager from the inspector.
member.param: The manager target to set the manager for.
member.returns: Whether or not a manager is currently set.

member.name: M:VisCommonEditor.DisplayIVisDataGroupTargetGUI(IVisDataGroupTarget)
member.summary: This displays the drop down for selecting a data group from the inspector.
member.param: The data group target to set the data group for.
member.returns: Whether or not a data group is currently set.

member.name: M:VisCommonEditor.DisplayIVisBaseControllerTargetGUI(IVisBaseControllerTarget)
member.summary: This displays the drop down for selecting a controller from the inspector.
member.param: The base controller target to set the controller for.
member.returns: Whether or not a controller is currently set.

member.name: M:VisCommonEditor.OnInspectorGUI
member.summary: This is called when the inspector gui needs to be displayed.

member.name: M:VisCommonEditor.CustomInspectorGUI
member.summary: This function is called by the base editor to display normal custom inspector gui.

member.name: M:VisCommonEditor.DisplayAutomaticInspectorGUI
member.summary: This displays the automatic inspector gui. Call this if you have public members you wish to edit automatically without manually setting up your inspector gui.

member.name: T:VisManagerEditor
member.summary: This is the editor for the VisManager.

member.name: M:VisManagerEditor.OnInspectorGUI
member.summary: Main inspector gui function.

member.name: T:VisDataGroupEditor
member.summary: This class is used as the custom editor for data groups.

member.name: M:VisDataGroupEditor.TargetInspectorGUI
member.summary: This is the function that is called by the base editor in order to display the custom inspector gui for required target objects.
member.returns: Whether or not the custom inspector gui found valid targets.

member.name: M:VisDataGroupEditor.CustomInspectorGUI
member.summary: This function is called by the base editor to display normal custom inspector gui.

member.name: T:VisBaseTriggerEditor
member.summary: This class is used as the base editor for all custom trigger editors.

member.name: M:VisBaseTriggerEditor.TargetInspectorGUI
member.summary: This is the function that is called by the base editor in order to display the custom inspector gui.
member.returns: Whether or not the custom inspector gui was finished.

member.name: M:VisBaseTriggerEditor.CustomInspectorGUI
member.summary: This function is called by the base editor to display normal custom inspector gui.

member.name: T:VisBaseControllerEditor
member.summary: This class is used as the base editor for all custom controller editors.

member.name: M:VisBaseControllerEditor.TargetInspectorGUI
member.summary: This is the function that is called by the base editor in order to display the custom inspector gui for required target objects.
member.returns: Whether or not the custom inspector gui found valid targets.

member.name: M:VisBaseControllerEditor.CustomInspectorGUI
member.summary: This function is called by the base editor to display normal custom inspector gui.

member.summary: This is the function that is called by the base editor in order to display the custom inspector gui.
